title: Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Double-blind, Single- and Multiple-Dose Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Tolerability of BMS-708163 in Healthy Young Male and Elderly Male and Female Chinese Subjects
description_brief: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics, safety and tolerability of BMS-708163 administered as single and multiple doses in Chinese subjects
drug: BMS-708163 (avagacestat) — oral small-molecule γ-secretase inhibitor targeting amyloid-β production
placebo: Placebo — used as control in the randomized, placebo-controlled study
